Module com.library
Package com.library.Services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.library.Services.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
A class providing services for managing users in the library system. Interacts with the UserManager to perform user-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String surname, String firstname, String email, String password, String username, Integer ssn)
      Creates and adds a new user to the user manager.
      Parameters:
      surname - The surname of the user.
      firstname - The firstname of the user.
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      username - The username of the user.
      ssn - The social security number of the user.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user, String surname, String firstname, String email, String password, String username, Integer ssn)
      Updates the information of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be updated.
      surname - The updated surname of the user.
      firstname - The updated firstname of the user.
      email - The updated email of the user.
      password - The updated password of the user.
      username - The updated username of the user.
      ssn - The updated social security number of the user.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes a specific user from the user manager.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be deleted.

    • usernameExists

      public boolean usernameExists(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists in the user manager.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      True if the username exists, false otherwise.

    • ssnExists

      public boolean ssnExists(Integer ssn)
      Checks if the ssn already exists in the user manager.
      Parameters:
      ssn - The ssn to check.
      Returns:
      True if the ssn exists, false otherwise.

    • emailExists

      public boolean emailExists(String email)
      Checks if an email already exists in the user manager.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check.
      Returns:
      True if the email exists, false otherwise.

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(UUID uid)
      Retrieves a user by their unique identifier. Used for retrieving users based on loan information.
      Parameters:
      uid - The unique identifier of the user.
      Returns:
      The user with the specified unique identifier, or null if not found.

    • searchUser

      public User searchUser(String username)
      Retrieves the user based on their username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for.
      Returns:
      The user with the specified username, or null if not found.
